nodes.text: Belandi Feearr was a female Mirialan Force healer who traveled to Spintir to hone her Force abilities and save Hethan Romund.

Belandi Feearr had formerly acted as a healer of her community due to her Force abilities. However, one day, she chose to let a ruthless Imperial officer die than heal him, causing her to be charged with murder. She was smuggled away by her friend Hethan Romund before she could be prosecuted.
After Romund was captured by the dark sider Malefax in 0 ABY, Feearr joined with other individuals to rescue her.
